text: Jürg Neuenschwander (14 January 1947 - 23 March 2014) was a Swiss organist and musician. He was best known for his work with Schweizer Radio DRS from 1982 to 1989. He was born in Eggiwil, canton of Bern. Neuenschwander died from a cerebral hemorrhage on 23 March 2014 in Bern. He was 67 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Organists Category:Swiss composers Category:Swiss musicians Category:People from the canton of Bern
title: Jürg Neuenschwander (organist)
